column5: I'm heading down to Baltimore, MD for the weekend with my teenager and was thinking about packing a rod for some shoreline saltwater fishing. Anyone have any tips?  I have never been there before but I am not one to pass up new water.   Thanks  Mike
Long poles and heavier gear for surf fishing. Pm Bly, she might be able to guide you down the right path.
Don't watch the HBO show "The Wire" before going to Baltimore - just don't do it
LOL...but seriously watch it. It is one of the best shows ever.
Amen.  But do it after your trip to Baltimore.
